EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Delivering Innovation To Market Faster_Briefing_Q215.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited: Financial Services Briefing - Delivering Innovation To Market Faster
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/delivering-innovation-to-market-faster-briefing/london> Established leaders in financial services are under attack from digital startups whose business model is all about delivering superior business innovation and customer experiences faster and cheaper through software.
To retain or attain a leadership position, existing financial services firms need to rediscover the art of modern software development practice and be able to release and update software-based offerings to market faster than their current approaches allow. THURSDAY
June 4, 2015
3:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Pivotal London Ofice REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/delivering-innovation-to-market-faster-briefing/london>
